remarks: An element covering an atom is a lattice line and vice-versa. (Contributed by NM, 18-Jun-2012.)
statement:
atcvrlln.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
atcvrlln.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
atcvrlln.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atcvrlln.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
atcvrlln $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ X C Y ) -> ( X e. A <-> Y e. N ) ) $.
